sentences.en: Her scarlet lipstick emphasized the whiteness of her teeth.
sentences.cn: 她鲜红色的口红更衬出了她牙齿的洁白。

sentences.en: James was quarantined for three weeks when he had scarlet fever.
sentences.cn: 詹姆士患猩红热后被隔离了三个星期.

sentences.en: Nay, we might have judged that such a child's mother must needs be a scarlet woman, and a worthy type of her of Babylon!
sentences.cn: 不，我们满可以判断，这样一个孩子的母亲，应该是一个鲜红色的女人，而且要当之无愧是个巴比伦式的女人④。

sentences.en: Scales of skin peel off after scarlet fever.
sentences.cn: 猩红热病愈后皮肤上的鳞屑就会脱落.
猩红热的接触传染性很强。

sentences.en: She turned scarlet from embarrassment, once she realized what she had done.
sentences.cn: 她意识到自己做了什么后羞红了脸。

sentences.en: She was a knockout in navy and scarlet.
sentences.cn: 她身着藏青色和鲜红色相间的衣服，十分迷人。

sentences.en: The band was dressed in scarlet.
sentences.cn: 乐队穿一色鲜红的制服.

sentences.en: The camellia blossoms are a more fiery scarlet.
The doctor segregated the child sick with scarlet fever.
sentences.cn: 大夫把患猩红热的孩子隔离起来.

sentences.en: The jacket is of scarlet cloth of a very fine weave.
sentences.cn: 这件夹克是由织法精妙的鲜红色布料做的。

sentences.en: They have lost their only son through scarlet fever.
sentences.cn: 他们失去了独生子,他是患猩红热死的.

sentences.en: Towards the end of the year he caught scarlet fever.
sentences.cn: 快到年底时他得了腥红热.
